name: Grass
description: $GRASS is the main utility token for the Rise of Sheertopia gaming ecosystem. It's your gateway to rewards, exclusive content, and much more! You will also be able to stake for rewards and special opportunities. It’s what fuels the in-game economy and unlocks cool opportunities for players. Here’s how you can use it: Wagering & Battles: Challenge others in PvP battles in Gen-S Battleground and wager GRASS for the chance to win BIG. Unlocking Premium Features: In Rise of Sheertopia, $GRASS lets you access exclusive zones, mini-games, and powerful boosts to enhance your gameplay. Staking for Rewards: By staking $GRASS, you can earn passive income (APY), unlock special in-game perks, and get early access to new content—like limited-edition NFTs and characters!
